name: jengaboot
description: Prototype that conforms to the magic-build spec. Implemented with Jenga.

scripts.postinstall: ocamlfind ocamlc -pp refmt -linkpkg -package yojson -g -impl buildUtils/extractDeps.re -o buildUtils/extractDeps.out && ocamlfind ocamlc -pp refmt -linkpkg -package yojson -g -impl buildUtils/extractOpamDeps.re -o buildUtils/extractOpamDeps.out
